Regulation Name(s): Cocaine and Cocaine Metabolite Test System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BIO-VENTURE Rapid Drug Test Cassettes for OTC and Rx use for qualitative urine detection of amphetamine, oxazepam, cocaine, methamphetamine, morphine, and marijuana
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid lateral flow immunoassay for qualitative detection of d-Amphetamine, Oxazepam, Benzoylecgonine, d-Methamphetamine, Morphine and Delta-9-THC-COOH in human urine for preliminary screening; intended for over-the-counter and prescription use
